p: Barrow weights were recorded at the beginning of the first balance period and at the end of the experiment. At the end of balance experiment, the animals were slaughtered following the procedure specified in legislation. Around 200 g samples of muscle (LD and ST) and organ (spleen, heart, liver and cecum) were taken in order to determine chemical, FA and AA compositions. The tissue samples were ground using an IKA Â® A 11 basic analytical mill (Werke GmbH & Co. KG, 79219 Staufen Germany) and liquid nitrogen.
